guide.title: Pomodoro Guide
guide.explanation1: Pomodoro = work 25' and rest 5' to maintain focus and reduce distractions.
guide.explanation2: Complete 4 sessions → take a 15' long break to recover.
guide.how1: Choose a task and select Work mode.
guide.how2: Start/Pause (Space), Reset (R), Skip to move sessions.
guide.how3: When a session ends → Short break; after 4 Work sessions → Long break.
guide.tip1: Set small, specific goals for each session.
guide.tip2: Turn off notifications and close unnecessary tabs.
guide.tip3: Avoid multitasking; jot down interruptions then return.
guide.defaultQuote: Focus on the next step — then repeat.

list: Focus on what you can control — one Pomodoro at a time.
Small, consistent steps make a big difference.
Discipline beats talent when talent lacks discipline.
Work deeply in the short term, achieve greatly in the long term.
